  • Constructor Details

    • SmartDevice

      public SmartDevice(String serialNumber, String ownerName, String macAddress, double price, LocalDate purchaseDate, int batteryLife, int currentBattery, String softwareVersion, boolean isConnectedByWifi) throws Exception
      Constructs a new SmartDevice with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      serialNumber - The serial number (format: XXX-000-XXX)
      ownerName - The owner's name
      macAddress - The MAC address (format: XX:XX:XX:XX:XX:XX)
      price - The price of the device
      purchaseDate - The date of purchase
      batteryLife - The maximum battery capacity in mAh
      currentBattery - The current battery level in mAh
      softwareVersion - The software version (format: X.X.X)
      isConnectedByWifi - Whether the device is connected via Wi-Fi
      Throws:
      Exception - If any parameter is invalid

    • calculateRemainingMinutesBattery

      public int calculateRemainingMinutesBattery(int avgMAhPerHour)
      Calculates the remaining battery life in minutes based on average consumption.
      Parameters:
      avgMAhPerHour - Average consumption in mAh per hour
      Returns:
      Remaining minutes of battery life, or 0 if avgMAhPerHour is invalid

    • calculateBatteryPercentage

      public double calculateBatteryPercentage()
      Returns:
      The current battery percentage

    • warrantyStatus

      public String warrantyStatus()
      Returns:
      The warranty status: "Out of warranty", "Close to the end of the warranty", or "Warranty won't end soon"

    • canUpdateSoftware

      public boolean canUpdateSoftware(String newSoftwareVersion)
      Checks if the software can be updated to the new version.
      Parameters:
      newSoftwareVersion - The version to update to
      Returns:
      True if update is possible, false otherwise

    • updateSoftware

      public void updateSoftware(String newSoftwareVersion) throws Exception
      Updates the software version if conditions are met.
      Parameters:
      newSoftwareVersion - The new software version to install
      Throws:
      Exception - If the software cannot be updated
